PositiveEntailmentTest.purpose: Test built-in predicates for XML Schema anyURI datatype

PremiseDocument.Presentation:
Document( Prefix(xs <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#>) Prefix(ex <http://example.org/example#>) Prefix(pred <http://www.w3.org/2007/rif-builtin-predicate#>)
Group ( ex:ok() :- And ( External( pred:is-literal-anyURI( "http://www.example.org"^^xs:anyURI ) ) External( pred:is-literal-not-anyURI("1"^^xs:integer ) ) External( pred:is-literal-anyURI( External ( xs:anyURI ( "http://www.example.org"^^xs:string ) ) ) ) ) ) )
